name: Esenthel RTS
description:
Esenthel RTS is a real time strategy game that is true to the roots of the genre.
Featuring:
• Humans and Orcs
• Controlling Units
• Harvesting Resources
• Constructing Buildings
• Fog of War
• 12 Missions (6 for each race, 6 included, 6 purchasable)
• 8 Types of Units (4 for each race)
• 8 Types of Buildings (4 for each race)
• 2 Language Versions (English + Polish)
• Wonderful Music

Thanks for your support!

Game was made with Esenthel Engine
You can get the game source code and the engine at http://www.esenthel.com
